page.title: 12Local News
page.content: Local News issues are dealt with in a number of{local newspapers:-The {Hitchin Gazette;The Hitchin Comet and {the North Herts.Mirror on Sunday. However,all of these are inevitably {mainly concerned with issues or events {relating to}the more populated areas of{Hitchin,Letchworth and Stevenage. {"Vandals Misery"is}the main headline in the N.H.M on Sunday.This describes how a water sports enthusiast was attacked and relieved of equipment worth almost Â£1,000 by a group of vandals.Not surprisingly {no mention of our area was made in {The Hitchin Gazette}either.However,a small article figured in{The Hitchin {Comet}about a barn dance in St.Ippolyts in aid of charity.This analysis of local newspapers was{made {between Monday May 6th and Sunday May {12th 1985.
